GLASS-Connect

Summary
GLASS-Connect is a directory and routing layer for research labs. It helps labs publish structured capability profiles, verifies key details, and routes collaboration requests to the right teams.

What it does
- Structured lab profiles for capabilities, equipment, and collaboration preferences.
- Light verification so partners can trust details.
- Direct routing of inbound collaboration requests to the right contacts.

Who it is for
- Research labs and core facilities.
- Network operators managing multiple labs.
- Industry partners looking for trusted collaborators.

How it works
1) Labs publish a profile with capabilities and preferences.
2) GLASS-Connect verifies key details.
3) Collaboration requests are routed to the right team.

Key outcomes
- Faster discovery of relevant labs.
- Trusted, comparable lab information.
- Less time spent chasing introductions.

Suggested description
GLASS-Connect is a verified lab directory and collaboration routing platform that helps partners find and contact the right research lab faster.
